Game

Class GameEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • Game.GameEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class GameEngine
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable

    Game Engine

    Creates objects for both Player and Board class,
    controls the execution of entire game
    and saves and loads the XML file

    Author:
    nav_k
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createXML

        public static void createXML(java.lang.String XMLFileName)
        Function createXML() creates an XML file and saves the current state of regions and players in that file in form of tags by using the lists of objects to retrieve values to be saved
        Parameters:
        XMLFileName - name of file to be created

      • getRegion

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node getRegion(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                         java.lang.String name,
                                         int rNumber,
                                         int rBuildingCost,
                                         int rMinionNum,
                                         int rBuildingNum,
                                         int rTroubleMarker,
                                         int rDemon,
                                         int rTroll,
                                         org.w3c.dom.Element PlayerStatusElement)
        Function acts as a utility method that creates a child node of region for root element and in return adds the parameters as its own children. Basically it creates hierarchy of elements
        Parameters:
        doc - Document
        name - String name of region
        rNumber - Integer number of region
        rBuildingCost - Integer building cost of region
        rMinionNum - Integer minion number of region
        rBuildingNumber - Integer building number of region
        rTroubleMarker - Integer trouble markers in a region
        rDemon - Integer number of demon in region
        rTroll - Integer number of trolls in region
        PlayerStatusElement - Element Containing info about PlayerStatus Hash
        Returns:
        Node that should be added to root element

      • getRegionElements

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node getRegionElements(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                                 org.w3c.dom.Element element,
                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                 int value)

      • getPlayer

        public static org.w3c.dom.Node getPlayer(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                         java.lang.String color,
                                         int buildingHold,
                                         int cashHold,
                                         int minionHold,
                                         java.lang.String personality,
                                         java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> pCards,
                                         int pNumber,
                                         int pTurn,
                                         org.w3c.dom.Element RegionStatusElement)
        Function acts as a utility method that creates a child node of player for root element and in return adds the parameters as its own children. Basically it creates hierarchy of players
        Parameters:
        doc - Document
        color - String color of player
        buildingHold - Integer number of buildings with player
        cashHold - Integer cash with a player
        minionHold - Integer number of minions with player
        personality - String personality card with player
        pCards - HashMap info of player cards with player
        pNumber - player number
        pTurn - turn of player
        RegionStatusElement - Element RegionStatus hash info
        Returns:
        Node of player that should be added to root element
